title: global ransomware attack
extract: Ransomware is a type of malicious software from cryptovirology that threatens to publish the victim's data or perpetually block access to it unless a ransom is paid. ... Starting from around 2012 the use of ransomware scams has grown internationally.
extract_html: Ransomware is a type of malicious software from cryptovirology that threatens to publish the victim's data or perpetually block access to it unless a ransom is paid. ... Starting from around 2012 the use of ransomware scams has grown internationally.
